      Get names of applications to use
      Specified by:

      ri - Representation Information

    • executeApp

      public void executeApp(String appName, DataObject dato)
      Description copied from interface: RepInfoUsage
      Execute the named application, inputting the DataObject. This could be something like displaying an image or document or playing music. This is essentially a conceptual extension of MediaType that is used for Web browsers, which ignores Semantics.
      Specified by:
      executeApp in interface RepInfoUsage
      Parameters:
      appName - The name of the application to use
      dato - The DataObject from which to get the bytes to provide to the application.
